text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, is this the training camp? It got a good feeling. This 
atmosphere too. It looks like it can be used for shooting!
choice_data_list: Welcome to the summer camp, Gold City!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Mm-hmm. I joined you in the middle of it, 
well, I've got to take my time back.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your hard work, Trainer-san. I’m sorry the delivery 
arrived late, our work got pushed.
choice_data_list: I’ll take care of her

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Well then, I’ll leave my luggage and change my clothes.
choice_data_list: Let’s meet at the beach 20 minutes later!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yes? I’ll be there in 10 minutes? Don’t underestimate 
the preparation speed of a model.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City! Just watch out for sunburn!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yeah-yeah, I got it, you know!
In this way, the summer training camp of Gold City began.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Are we all cooking today? Huh? I have never cooked 
before. Wait, I can’t! I can’t! I can’t!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
It will be okay! Just calm down. Eh, I’ve never 
seen such a panicked face before. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: City-chan! Let’s go again, all lively from the morning!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ah~… sleep. I don’t have to practice early 
in the morning. Seriously, not possible…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Then, let’s run 1 more time! But, this time I’ll win!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: …Interesting. I won’t lose. You can bet 3 high-grade carrots.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: That’s my line! I’m in!

After dinner, I was asked to meet outside by Gold City. We came 
to the beach together because she wanted to talk.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…You know I, before I gave up on this training camp. I had more 
work and work, I wondered if I would ever participate.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But, I made a fitting schedule with you and talked to the 
manager. Then, I was able to participate in this way.
choice_data_list: It was good!
It was good!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Mm-hmm, it was good. Really… I think the me from 
before, would just have complained about being 
frustrated that she could not participate.
choice_data_list: You’ve grown so much!
You’ve grown so much!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Popo! Too stiff! But well… I’m grateful to you.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Even if I participated in the middle, I learned a lot. I was also 
able to know what the other horse girls are like.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I was able to see a lot of the “unknown side to others” . I 
realized I was also looking at the others just by their image…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Come to think of it, there’s a festival in the 
neighborhood soon. Would you like to go? I want 
to see the faces of all kinds of people!

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: Woah, it’s City! Beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Fan
text_block_list.text: Ah, Umm. I’m cheering for you!

text_block_list.name: Elder Stallkeepster
text_block_list.text: Here, take this. It’s delicious!

Gold City sure is popular. She returned a smile to the people who 
called her out, in a familiar manner.

text_block_list.name: Boy
text_block_list.text: City, good luck.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Thank you. You watching the race makes me really happy.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Ehehe, my face is cracked more than I expected. How hilarious.
choice_data_list: That’s proof that you’re working hard
That’s proof that you’re working hard

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Model and race, I wonder which one of those efforts you are 
watching. Although, I only want you to see my racing abilities.
choice_data_list: Modelling should also contribute to the race

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? No way.
choice_data_list: Let’s run and check it out!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Run, hey, you mean right now!?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Why should I run here until the end of the festival…!? I don’t 
know, seriously, I don’t know what it means…!
choice_data_list: Well then, I’ll take the time
Well then, I’ll take the time

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Listen to me. Yeah-yeah, I got it. Then I will go. Steady…
choice_data_list: GO!

text_block_list.text: Gold City ran through the sand at once!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Phew… What is the time?…Mm-hmm, so that’s it.
choice_data_list: Next time, let’s run while remembering the cheering

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh~? I don’t think anything will change. Anyway, I’m going!
Gold City ran the same as before.
choice_data_list: City, you can do it!
City, you can do it!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Ah, Trainer… like that. But… speaking 
of which, at the festival…

text_block_list.name: Boy
text_block_list.text: City, good luck.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Alright!
Gold City accelerated further. And thenー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: GOAL…!
The result is… the best record time in this training camp.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
*Pant*… *Pant*… After I heard your voice. I remembered the 
cheering of the children. And then, my legs moved forward…
choice_data_list: That’s the power of the fans
That’s the power of the fans

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You mean that power is going to help me 
step further? Then, then you see…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
If you could bring the fans who gathered 
in the face of a model to the raceー
choice_data_list: There’s no doubt about it!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha wow, such impure motives! You’re going to use the fans. You 
pretend to be kind but you sure are calculating.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But… haha, how interesting. I can show off my 
run to the fans who only know me as a model.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: That I’m not just a pretty doll, but an amazing horse girl!
choice_data_list: The effect of running on both paths is great
The effect of running on both paths is great

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Yeah-yeah. I’ll be sure to follow. In order 
to win, It seems I need your power.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: That’s why… Glad to have you here, Trainer. My partner.
